channel.title: Data Hungry on Late News
channel.description: Recent content in Data Hungry on Late News

item.title: OpenAI Launches GPT-4.5 for ChatGPT—It’s Huge and Compute-Intensive
item.description: Internally called Orion, GPT-4.5 is OpenAI’s largest model to date, and it’s first available through the company’s $200 monthly ChatGPT subscription.
